brief: Norway's golden Winter Olympics continue in Milano-Cortina today
Mixed relay biathlon and cross-country skiing headline Norwegian medal hopes
Premier League midweek action features Liverpool at Sunderland

items.text: Wed 16:00 ‚Äî Normal Hill Ski Jumping (Granerud, Lindvik)

expandItems.text: Thu 10:00 ‚Äî Men's 20km Individual Biathlon (J. Boe, T. Boe)
Thu 10:00 ‚Äî Men's Giant Slalom Alpine (Kristoffersen, Braathen)

radar: Klaebo aims for sprint gold on Friday while Johaug returns to Olympic cross-country Wednesday morning. Kristoffersen and Braathen face tough giant slalom competition Thursday, with Austria and Switzerland bringing strong lineups. Biathlon relays could deliver multiple medals with the Boe brothers and Roeiseland in peak form.
